nodes.text: Hangar 18 was an abandoned hangar used as a storage warehouse on Level 1325 of the Coruscant underworld, on the side of an underworld portal. In 19 BBY, while on the run after being framed for attempting to assassinate Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine, rogue ARC trooper Fives arranged to meet his superiors, Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain Rex, at the warehouse in an attempt to clear his name. However, the Coruscant Guard found out about the meeting, and Fives, having been drugged into a state of aggression and paranoia, was subsequently shot dead by Clone Commander Fox.
